extra-ddl.ddl-script: create or replace view order_agg_vw as select d.order_id as id, d.order_id as order_id, sum(d.order_qty * d.unit_price) as order_total, sum(d.ship_qty * d.unit_price) as ship_total, sum(d.ship_qty * d.unit_price) as ship_total2 from order_detail d group by d.order_id;

drop view if exists order_agg_vw;
create view order_agg_vw as select d.order_id as id, d.order_id as order_id, sum(d.order_qty * d.unit_price) as order_total, sum(d.ship_qty * d.unit_price) as ship_total, sum(d.ship_qty * d.unit_price) as ship_total2 from order_detail d group by d.order_id;
